forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 59F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low 8C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear this evening then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low 46F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 14C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 58F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 19C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 66F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 19C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 66F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 51F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 47F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and damp with rain in the morning...then becoming partly cloudy. High 14C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early. A mix of sun and clouds in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 7C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 45F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny. High 16C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 61F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 6C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 43F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 62F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 62F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 17C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 63F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
